Package bucksimulator.controller

Class SimController

java.lang.Object
bucksimulator.controller.SimController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class SimController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
FXML Controller class. Serves as the interface between main user interface and the business logic.
Author:
balaram

    • addThroughputSeries

      public void addThroughputSeries​(Simulation sim)
      Bar chart will be updated with the throughput data from the selected simulation. Same chart is used to show the through put for all simulations. So the current data will be swapped with the new data from the newly selected simulation.
      Parameters:
      sim -

    • addRCLSeriesYT

      public void addRCLSeriesYT​(Simulation sim)
      Add the Radio Contact Data to the chart for the corresponding simulation. Same chart is used for all the simulations, so the current data will be swapped with the data from the new simulation selected. This function adds the receiving agents id and global tick data to the chart.
      Parameters:
      sim -

    • addRCLSeriesXT

      public void addRCLSeriesXT​(Simulation sim)
      Add the Radio Contact Data to the chart for the corresponding simulation. Same chart is used for all the simulations, so the current data will be swapped with the data from the new simulation selected. This function adds the sending agent and global tick data to the chart.
      Parameters:
      sim -

    • addRCLSeriesXY

      public void addRCLSeriesXY​(Simulation sim)
      Add the Radio Contact Data to the chart for the corresponding simulation. Same chart is used for all the simulations, so the current data will be swapped with the data from the new simulation selected. This function adds the sending agent and receiving agents ids data to the chart.
      Parameters:
      sim -

    • addGPSLiveSeries

      public void addGPSLiveSeries​(Simulation sim)
      Add the GPS Live Data to the chart for the corresponding simulation. Same chart is used for all the simulations, so the current data will be swapped with the data from the new simulation selected.
      Parameters:
      sim -

    • killTasks

      public void killTasks()
      Kills all the simulations if they are started but not completed when the simulation tool is being closed.
